author: Anita Hassan
title: Arizona mayors slam stay-at-home order that allows hair salons, golf courses to remain open
description: Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey issued a stay-at-home order Monday, but local mayors, who have repeatedly been critical of his COVID-19 response, say it doesn't go far enough.
content:
Leslie Leach shut down her hair salon in Chandler, Arizona, two weeks ago, after reading the Centers for Disease Control and Preventions guidelines on social distancing amid the coronavirus outbreak.
Leach, 35, knew she could not cut or color her clients hai… [+7585 chars]
